content: Hello dudes and ladies, Just a heads up to OG Bitcoin community about Thorchain Its a Layer 1 blockchain actually build using Cosmos SDK and there you can exchange Â native (not wrapped and not bridged) Bitcoin and other assets. Now it serve about 2% of day spot BTC exchange volume, doing it decentralized and with deep liquidity.It is developed by many people and anyone can be node/custody as well as any chain may join party. Shapeshift and Erik Voorhees like it https://twitter.com/ErikVoorhees/status/1725575426414719414 as well as many other OG dudes in the market. Many chains and wallets integrated, like trustwallet and expanding. This is a protocol to power DEXs and you can play with it to start own.Here are some links to youhttps://thorchain.org/https://twitter.com/THORChainhttps://github.com/thorchain/Resources/tree/master/Whitepapershttps://viewblock.io/thorchainhttps://linktr.ee/thorchainCan paste more but whatever, if you are interested you will follow project.And of course its main utility token $RUNE will lead holders to ValhallaThank you, your dogewski https://twitter.com/dogewski
